game_history.topic: Should Rome increase the military budget?

game_state.current_topic: Should Rome form an alliance with Egypt?

senators.name: Quintus Licinius
senators.background: Claims to have received divine omens guiding political decisions. Openly ambitious about holding higher office.

senators.name: Gaius Flavius Rufus
senators.background: Comes from one of Rome's oldest patrician families. Staunchly defends the mos maiorum (ancestral customs).

senators.name: Servius Cornelius
senators.background: Represents the interests of Rome's growing commercial class. Has a reputation for unusual honesty in politics.

senators.name: Gaius Antonius
senators.background: Distinguished in campaigns against Gallic tribes. Has a reputation for unusual honesty in politics. Openly ambitious about holding higher office.

senators.name: Marcus Sempronius
senators.background: Former military tribune with connections to influential generals. Openly ambitious about holding higher office.
